decision_conditions: The submitted details for conditions 5 (construction management plan) of planning permission 21/01934/FUL do not specifically demonstrate how points (a)- (j) of the condition would be achieved and therefore the applicant has not demonstrated that the development would safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers or safeguard highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012..
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
